name: Frank Leymann
content: Prof. Dr. Dr. h. c. Frank Leymann | Institute of Architecture of Application Systems | University of Stuttgart jump to content jump to footer back close navigation For full functionality of this site it is necessary to enable JavaScript. Here are the instructions how to enable JavaScript in your web browser. Frank Leymann Prof. Dr. Dr. h. c. Managing DirectorInstitute of Architecture of Application Systems Contact +49 711 685 88470 +49 711 685 88472 Email Universitätsstraße 38 70569 Stuttgart Germany Room: 1.359 Office Hours Please contact my secretary to schedule a meeting.
